about.heroSubtitle: We strive for a healthier world!
about.whoWeAreTitle: With us, you discover not only medicine but a wide range of services.
about.whoWeAreText: Tek Grup Saglik Hizmetleri LLC was established in 2018 and is part of the internationally renowned TEKGRUP holding, with over 10 years of experience. It has been operating in the pharmaceutical distribution market of Uzbekistan since 2023.The company operates based on the principle of Fair Competition and continues to adhere to this policy in relation to all employees and stakeholders.The range of pharmaceutical products is expanding in line with technological advancements and the needs of the population.With a well-developed infrastructure and a team of innovative, creative professionals, they continuously enhance their professional knowledge and skills in the field of pharmaceuticals and healthcare.
about.whatWeDoText: Tek Grup offers a wide range of pharmaceuticals, medical equipment, cosmetics, and hygiene products. Thanks to our excellent facilities and storage conditions, we deliver all products to our clients safely and reliably.
about.servicesTitle: Services provided by “Tek Grup Saglik Hizmetleri” Foreign LLC
about.service1: Storage and delivery of pharmaceutical products.
about.service2: Marketing and distribution of medicines, medical equipment, cosmetics and hygiene products;

contact.contact_subheading: Interested in our services? Get in touch with us!
